critique: The document is a simple amendment to an existing executive order, adding the Bureau of Lighthouses to the Board of Surveys and Maps. The tone is formal and administrative. There is no explicit or implicit emotional appeal. As such, the initial scores should be very low across all emotions. The initial scores are: disgust: 1, fear: 1, joy: 1, sadness: 1, surprise: 1. The revised scores should remain the same as there is no emotional content to adjust.
